verses.name: Joshua 19:34
verses.text: And then the coast turneth westward to Aznoth–tabor, and goeth out from thence to Hukkok, and reacheth to Zebulun on the south side, and reacheth to Asher on the west side, and to Judah upon Jordan toward the sunrising.

verses.name: Joshua 19:35
verses.text: And the fenced cities are Ziddim, Zer, and Hammath, Rakkath, and Chinnereth,

verses.name: Joshua 19:36
verses.text: And Adamah, and Ramah, and Hazor,

verses.name: Joshua 19:37
verses.text: And Kedesh, and Edrei, and En–hazor,

verses.name: Joshua 19:38
verses.text: And Iron, and Migdal–el, Horem, and Beth–anath, and Beth–shemesh; nineteen cities with their villages.

verses.name: Joshua 19:39
verses.text: This is the inheritance of the tribe of the children of Naphtali according to their families, the cities and their villages.
